subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Dusty Wathan spent 14 years in the minors for one short stint in the majors, which makes him ideally suited to pass on what he knows to the prospects he now manages.
snippet: Dusty Wathan spent 14 years in the minors for one short stint in the majors, which makes him ideally suited to pass on what he knows to the prospects he now manages.
